datetime.title: DateTime
datetime.description: Time at which the interval starts.

qualitystatus.title: Quality status
qualitystatus.description: Indication on the reliability of the data.  The possible values are the following: Non-validated: no error registered during the calculation and publication run. The published data are likely but have not been validated by an operator. Data issue: at least one error registered during the calculation and publication run. The published data are uncertain and must be reviewed by an operator.Validated: The published values have been validated.

netregulationvolume.title: Net regulation volume
netregulationvolume.description: The difference between the sum of the volumes of all upward regulations and the sum of the volumes of all downward regulations requested by Elia.

systemimbalance.title: System imbalance
systemimbalance.description: Value calculated as the difference between the Area Control Error (ACE) and the Net Regulation Value (NRV).

alpha.title: Alpha
alpha.description: Additional incentive applied on top of the regulation costs in case of major system imbalances. The Î± -factor is determined as a function of SI. It is used to push BRPs to restore system imbalance as soon as possible.

marginalincrementalprice.title: Marginal incremental price
marginalincrementalprice.description: The highest price paid by Elia for upward regulation during the time slot.

marginaldecrementalprice.title: Marginal decremental price
marginaldecrementalprice.description: The lowest price received by Elia for downward regulation during the time slot.

strategicreserveprice.title: Strategic reserve price
strategicreserveprice.description: Price when a volume of the strategic reserve is activated in the system.

positiveimbalanceprice.title: Positive imbalance price
positiveimbalanceprice.description: Tariff applicable for a positive imbalance.

negativeimbalanceprice.title: Negative imbalance price
negativeimbalanceprice.description: Tariff applicable for a negative imbalance.
